subject: Re: Michael Jackson
author: Bonnie
full_text:
Hi Everyone,

I have to agree with Zack, however getting validation can be very difficult.

I have heard from a spirit person who identified himself as Michael Jackson via mediumship.  I am trying to get Deepak Chopra to examine the transcript.  He knew Michael Jackson personally and should be able to verify the contents. I have sent several emails to Deepak Chopra's publicist.  She keeps reading them but not responding.  The transcript is very personal and I am keeping it private but I was left with something that I can make public.

This is word for word:
"If people ask how I am doing tell them I am trying to figure this all out.  I love my children very much and I am so sad on the affect this will have on them.  Bye for now Michael."

If anyone has a suggestion or direct contact information for Deepak Chopra please let me know.  I am in San Diego within short driving distance of the Chopra Center. 

Thx,
Bonnie Vent
www.bonnievent.com 

   


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Zack Widup <w9sz.zack@...> wrote:
>
> The only thing is, we don't know WHO's really saying all this stuff. Just
> because someone says he or she is person "X" doesn't prove it unless you get
> something only that person and a few others may know. If someone were able
> to spell my mother's maiden name you'd have something!
> 
> I get all sorts of e-mails from wealthy people in far away places wanting to
> give it away to me.
> :-)
> 
> Zack
> 
> On Tue, Jun 30, 2009 at 5:43 PM, James W. Hyslope <clockdryve@...>wrote:
> 
> >
> >
> > Well would you guys think I'm nuts if I told you I have a short EVP from
> > Michael Jackson? I was at a park here in Des Moines, Iowa on June 28th. The
> > name of the location is Prospect Park. In the original file I ask if MJ can
> > hear me.....and I get a "yes I can". Well then I run this through a denoise
> > program and I hear "yes I can" then a second later I hear a young boy with a
> > mockish tone say "your talking in the last mike" (also think I hear a young
> > girl later but can't make it out)*I MIGHT understand the girl, but won't
> > make a statement at this time. The boy is easier to hear in the denoised
> > program (better than Michael). BUT both voices are hard to hear. Maybe you
> > can amplify for yourself.....that way I won't SPLATTER the audio to much and
> > you might be able to adjust for yourself. If someone wants the unedited WAV
> > file that's 1.16MB I can send to email address. That way you might be able
> > to -denoise- or enhance MUCH better than I am able to. I can just make out
> > what is said........but I assure you>>>>it is in there!!! I am sending the
> > MP3 to my files folder, it is the denoised version. I'm not to familiar with
> > the denoise program so I think I used the default settings. Jim H
> >
> > 
> >
>
